entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:41 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pincher Creek Airport 03:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: W 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning after midnight. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border in the evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
